message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $115, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $112?
